column4: Hi, I have 1 paration (1 hd) with windows 7 on it, is it possible to install ubutu in dual mode without reinstalling my windows again?
i would suggest using windows to resize yur windwos install. and leave a section of the HD unallocated. then boot the ubuntu cd and start the ubuntu installer
installtion knows how to do that with out destryoing any data?
it CAN - but the windows resize tool is faster i find. by like 5x
